elements.description: All sounds muffled by a haze of grey.

elements.description: The quiet cacophony of rain.

elements.label: Bright Day's Bustle
elements.description: Life inevitably finds its way outside on a lovely day. Its sounds follow.

elements.label: The Whistle Of The Sirocco
elements.description: The winds flow here mercilesly from where the Sun's rule is still felt most oppressively.

elements.label: The Hum Of Heat
elements.description: The air wavers. Even sound does not escape such heat unchanged.

elements.label: Trade Winds' Bellows
elements.description: Unrelenting, unified, unceasing. The sound of air moving with purpose.
